basics.name: Daniel Coimbra Salomao
basics.label: Computer Science Student
basics.summary: I am a Computer Science student at the University of Utah, specializing in software development, AI, and robotics. With hands-on experience from internships and research roles, I am passionate about creating innovative solutions in software engineering, algorithm design, and machine learning. I am an active member of ULEEF and the Thoery in Practice research group, and I look forward to graduating in December 2024.
